languages.text: "Слышь, друг — а долго это было? Надписи эти? Что-нибудь еще странное в доме происходило? Предметы летали, мебель щупла отращивала, люди мерли просто так?"
"Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"
languages.original_text: "Слышь, друг — а долго это было? Надписи эти? Что-нибудь еще странное в доме происходило? Предметы летали, мебель щупла отращивала, люди мерли просто так?"

traits.locale_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? Those writings? Anything else strange happened in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? Those writings? Anything else strange happened in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “嘿，朋友，我想问问，那件事情持续了多久？就是那些怪字。他家里还发生过别的什么怪事吗？比如飞出来的小玩意儿，突然长出来的触手，或是有什么人无缘无故地没命之类的？”
languages.original_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"

traits.locale_text: “嘿，朋友，我想问问，那件事情持续了多久？就是那些怪字。他家里还发生过别的什么怪事吗？比如飞出来的小玩意儿，突然长出来的触手，或是有什么人无缘无故地没命之类的？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Oye, amigo, dime: ¿cuánto tiempo duró eso de los garabatos? ¿Hubo más sucesos extraños en la casa? ¿Cosas volando, muebles con tentáculos, gente que caía muerta sin motivo?».
languages.original_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"

traits.locale_text: «Oye, amigo, dime: ¿cuánto tiempo duró eso de los garabatos? ¿Hubo más sucesos extraños en la casa? ¿Cosas volando, muebles con tentáculos, gente que caía muerta sin motivo?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ねえ、その落書きはいつまで続いたの？家の中で変なことは起こらなかった？何かが飛ぶとか、家具から触手が生えてくるとか、意味もなく人が死ぬとか…」
languages.original_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"

traits.locale_text: 「ねえ、その落書きはいつまで続いたの？家の中で変なことは起こらなかった？何かが飛ぶとか、家具から触手が生えてくるとか、意味もなく人が死ぬとか…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hey, guter Mann – seit wann ging das so? Diese Schrift, meine ich. Sind noch andere seltsame Dinge im Haus passiert? Fliegende Gegenstände, Möbel mit Tentakeln, grundlose Todesfälle?"
languages.original_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"

traits.locale_text: "Hey, guter Mann – seit wann ging das so? Diese Schrift, meine ich. Sind noch andere seltsame Dinge im Haus passiert? Fliegende Gegenstände, Möbel mit Tentakeln, grundlose Todesfälle?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Hé, l'ami, ça a duré combien de temps, cette affaire ? Les mots sur les murs ? Est-ce qu'il s'est passé d'autres choses étranges dans cette maison ? Des objets qui volent, des tentacules qui poussent sur les meubles, des gens qui meurent sans raison ? »
languages.original_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"

traits.locale_text: « Hé, l'ami, ça a duré combien de temps, cette affaire ? Les mots sur les murs ? Est-ce qu'il s'est passé d'autres choses étranges dans cette maison ? Des objets qui volent, des tentacules qui poussent sur les meubles, des gens qui meurent sans raison ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Yazı olayı ne kadar devam etti? Evde başka tuhaf durumlar yaşandı mı? Uçuşan biblolar, dokunaçları çıkan mobilyalar, sebepsiz yere ölen insanlar falan mesela?"
languages.original_text: "Hey, listen, friend — how long did that go on? The writing? Anything else strange happen in the household? Flying knickknacks, furniture growing tentacles, people dying for no reason?"

traits.locale_text: "O yazı olayı ne kadar devam etti dostum? Evde yaşanan başka tuhaf olaylar var mıydı? Uçan biblolar, dokunaçları çıkan mobilyalar, sebepsiz yere ölen insanlar falan mesela?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
